extension.name: User - NFPT External User Change
extension.author: Levi Carter
extension.description: Plugin for NFPT to update users_live table. To be used in conjunction with the nfptusersync plugin.

field.name: myupdatefield
field.label: My Site Suffix
field.description: field suffix for this website in the users_live table (eg: ns)

field.name: failemail
field.label: Failsafe Email Address
field.description: email address to notify if there is a problem updating the user in the main database
